rows.label: tev035701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Panyar about living conditions in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Panyar about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Panyar what things were like during the attack.

rows.label: tev035701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Panyar about the Wrothians.

rows.label: tev035701_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Panyar about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0001
rows.name:
My mother Vyponne and I are really living it up here
in in your wonderful city, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0002
rows.name:
It's a shame the whole experience is marred by these
"contracts" and "promises" you value so much, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0003
rows.name:
They make it exceedingly difficult for an honest Ma-non
to leave the ship and live among the rest of you,
do they not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thankfully, Victoria is understanding, but it sounds like
humans usually insist their workers go to the office the
same hours every single day or...something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0005
rows.name:
That's a tall order for free-spirited wanderers of the
cosmos like the Ma-non. We sleep when we're sleepy
and work when we're worky, you know what I mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0008
rows.name:
That wild perfume Victoria and I came up with has
been a massive seller, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Whenever I'm with her, the the ideas flow like water.
She's totally wild, isn't she?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0010
rows.name:
We need to keep pushing those boundaries out,
though, don't we? Hmm... Hey, I've got it!
You humans like to cut and dye your hair, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0011
rows.name:
There's got to be a way to bring that to the Ma-non
market—maybe a Ma-non mohawk to complement our
hip fragrances?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Wait a second. Ma-non don't have body hair,
do they? Hmm. This "pushing the boundaries" thing
might be be be harder than than I thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0030
rows.name:
When I heard the city was in danger, I took Victoria to
safety on the Ma-non ship right away, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0031
rows.name:
But because there were so many Ma-non around,
she lost track of me. She actually said she couldn't tell
us apart, if you can believe that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0032
rows.name:
Maybe I should have used that perfume of ours to clue
her in? What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0033
rows.name:
Oh, wait... It's a hit seller, isn't it? Which means
EVERYONE is wearing the same perfume, doesn't it?
*sigh* I've doomed myself to to anonymity, haven't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0038
rows.name:
There are more xenoforms living in New LA than ever,
are there not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Those folk with the strange ears? The Wrothians?
They have proportions similar to humans, so I tried
recommending them some clothes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0040
rows.name:
But they wouldn't even entertain the idea. I guess the
Wrothians hate clothes that are hard to fight in?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0041
rows.name:
A shame, isn't it? If they spent less time fighting,
they could maybe light the fashion world on on fire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0013
rows.name:
My mother Vyponne and I are really living it up here
in in your wonderful city, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0014
rows.name:
It's a shame the whole experience is marred by these
"contracts" and "promises" you value so much, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0015
rows.name:
They make it exceedingly difficult for an honest Ma-non
to leave the ship and live among the rest of you,
do they not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0016
rows.name:
Thankfully, Victoria is understanding, but it sounds like
humans usually insist their workers go to the office
the the same hours every single day or...something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0017
rows.name:
That's a tall order for free-spirited wanderers of the
cosmos like the Ma-non. We sleep when we're sleepy
and work when we're worky, you know what I mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0020
rows.name:
That relaxing perfume Victoria and I came up with has
been a massive seller, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0021
rows.name:
Whenever I'm with her, the the ideas flow like water.
She's totally wild, isn't she?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0022
rows.name:
We need to keep pushing those boundaries out,
though, don't we? Hmm... Hey, I've got it!
You humans like to wear makeup, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0023
rows.name:
There's got to be a way to bring that to the Ma-non
market—maybe some powder to to lighten our
complexions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035701_MSG0024
rows.name:
...Actually, that sounds terrifying. We'd look like ghosts,
wouldn't we? Hmm. This "pushing the boundaries"
thing might be be be harder than I thought.[ST:wait ]
